reviews.author: My honest opinion.
reviews.title: A readers dream!
reviews.content: This app has everything a reader could ever wish for or want. All conveniently packaged in an easy to use and understand app that's frequently updated. And get this, the people leading this small business actually hear you, see you and get back to you!

reviews.author: Paigebaugh
reviews.title: So good!!
reviews.content: No notes. I know that any bugs or lagging are still getting worked out, and I'm more than happy to wait in the meantime.

reviews.author: tinadee99
reviews.title: Two requests
reviews.content: I absolutely adore this app!! One thing I would like is the ability to follow authors and sync your contacts to find friends

reviews.author: ansolutelynot1990
reviews.title: Great app
reviews.content: I love the clean layout. It makes everything easy to find and use. The reviews of the books also contain a lot of great information when I'm looking for something new to read.

reviews.author: K26ghcx
reviews.title: Good was great and now it's just good
reviews.content: I loved this app. It tracks everything I read and gives me great information. Recently the section that said how many books I've read compared to my goal has disappeared!

reviews.author: Crgbbtrshiib4678
reviews.title: Love the concept!
reviews.content: I find the app a little buggy (Apple iOS) when changing the status of a book. Other than that, I love not using good reads, and the AI recommendation engine.

reviews.author: mishfishh13
reviews.title: AI Personalized Review is EVERYTHING
reviews.content: I've been tracking what I read since I was 10 years old. StoryGraph is the UI that is the worst and I wouldn't come back to it if it weren't for the AI Personalized Review.

reviews.author: Amandajo1223
reviews.title: Charging issues
reviews.content: Did anybody else automatically get charged nine dollars when downloading this app because it stated that there was an app purchases but didn't state that it cost?

reviews.author: .j0s@bmanc
reviews.title: I LOVE
reviews.content: Storygraph is truly wonderful! The stats are so awesome, and I love being able to look back on my reading in the past years and months.

reviews.author: SeattlePress
reviews.title: Sometimes slow
reviews.content: I love this app but have been frustrated the past couple months with its sluggish loading - and sometimes it doesn't load at all!
